Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

<!--more-->

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

## 4. map

Gomap $GOROOT/src/pkg/runtime/hashmap.goc 

### 4.1 



```go
struct Hmap
{
    uint8   B;    // 2^B
    uint16  bucketsize;   // 

    byte    *buckets;     // 2^BBuckets
    byte    *oldbuckets;  // buckets
};
```

HmapBucketBucket*BucketBucketBucketBucketmallocgc

hashhashmodhashhash22^Bbucketsoldbucketsbucketsoldbucketsoldbucketsbucketsoldbuckets

Bucket

```go
struct Bucket
{
    uint8  tophash[BUCKETSIZE]; // hash8....bucketarraybucket
    Bucket *overflow;           // 
    byte   data[1];             // BUCKETSIZE keys followed by BUCKETSIZE values
};
```

BUCKETSIZE8bucket8key/value, 8bucketbucket

keyhashkeyhashhashHmapbucketsindexkeybuckethash8buckettophash**8key/valuebucketoffsettophash**hashbuckettophash[i]bucketikeykeyvalueoverflow buckets

hash(XX)

![image-20201202173456850](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/gods-view/images/master/imageimage-20201202173456850.png)

2.2 HMap

Bucketkey/valuekeysvalueskeyvaluekey1/value1/key2/value2 map[int64]int8Go

### 4.2 



2^B2^(B+1)2(hash mod 2^B)(hash & (2^B-1))

XYhash(hash mod X)(hash mod Y)hashpairtable(evacuate) insertremove1-2pairGo

mapmapwebmap

2bucketbucketoldbucket

old tablenew table hash tableinsert, remove, lookupbucketoldbucket

grow growoverflow buckets (go(#define LOAD 6.5), tabletable grow6.5

```
        LOAD    %overflow  bytes/entry     hitprobe    missprobe
        4.00         2.13        20.77         3.00         4.00
        4.50         4.05        17.30         3.25         4.50
        5.00         6.85        14.77         3.50         5.00
        5.50        10.55        12.94         3.75         5.50
        6.00        15.27        11.67         4.00         6.00
        6.50        20.90        10.79         4.25         6.50
        7.00        27.14        10.15         4.50         7.00
        7.50        34.03         9.73         4.75         7.50
        8.00        41.10         9.40         5.00         8.00

 %overflow   = percentage of buckets which have an overflow bucket
 bytes/entry = overhead bytes used per key/value pair
 hitprobe    = # of entries to check when looking up a present key
 missprobe   = # of entries to check when looking up an absent key
```



### 4.3 

1. keyhash
2. old table, old tablebucketevacuated3 value
3. new tablevalue

bucketindexkey/valulebucketoffset8offsetkey

```
do { //b
    //tophashhash
    for(i = 0, k = b->data, v = k + h->keysize * BUCKETSIZE; i < BUCKETSIZE; i++, k += h->keysize, v += h->valuesize) {
        if(b->tophash[i] == top) { 
            k2 = IK(h, k);
            t->key->alg->equal(&eq, t->key->size, key, k2);
            if(eq) { //key...
                *keyp = k2;
                return IV(h, v);
            }
        }
    }
    b = b->overflow; //b
} while(b != nil);
```

### 4.4 

1. keyhashbucket
2. bucketold tablenew table
3. bucketkeyvalue
4. tablegrow table
5. bucketfullbucketoverbucket
6. key/value pairbucket



oldbucketoldbucketoldbucketoldbucketkeybucketevalucatedpair

bucketkey/valuebucket()keybucketkeymap

### 4.5 map

map

HMapBucketBucketmallocgc(Bucket)bucketbucketevalucatedoldbucket

freelistTODObucket

bucketkey/valuekey/valuekeyvalue128bucketbucketkey/value

bucket8key/valueoffsetbucketbucket8O(1)hash

### 5.1 interface

vnilinterface

```go
var v *T
var i interface{}
i = v
```

iinterfacenilnil

GoerrorError

```go
type error interface {
    Error() string
}
```

error

```go
type Error struct {
    errCode uint8
}
func (e *Error) Error() string {
        switch e.errCode {
        case 1:
                return "file not found"
        case 2:
                return "time out"
        case 3:
                return "permission denied"
        default:
                return "unknown error"
         }
}
```



```go
func checkError(err error) {
    if err != nil {
        panic(err)
    }
}
var e *Error
checkError(e)
```

enilcheckErrorpanic
